Build: I20051206-0826

1) Using the previous I-build, I shutdown my workspace that had an editor open on a class file.  This class file was in the PDE "External Plug-in Libraries" project's classpath.

2) On the first startup with the new build, an "internal error occurred" while opening the class file editor. I will attach the log file.

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: The classfile is not on the classpath
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.ClassFileEditor.doSetInput(ClassFileEditor.java:623)
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor$17.run(AbstractTextEditor.java:2375)
...
